name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.
- Requires Basemod, StSLib to run.

v0.4.0
- 2 new relics: FlyingFruit, Leftovers
- HP changed to 72 (was 64)
- Text changes. The Sack explains that Toy Orth doesn't work on Lesser Potions.
- Lesser Potion changes
- Buff: Gather Material, Herbalism, Polymorphism, Scent of Rosmari, Smart Maneuver, Grow Book, Mind Search, Scroll of Purity, Lucky Clover
- Rework: Save Valuables

v0.4.1
-  

- For more information, visit
https://github.com/Celicath/GathererMod/releases
